title: Sizing - DShapes
description: How to install dicons and download icons for your app.

body.raw:
This site is a work in progress. If you see dummy text on a page, it means I'm still working on it. You can follow updates on Twitter [@designali_in](https://twitter.com/designali_in). ## By default, the size of all icons is 24px by 24px. The size is adjustable using the size prop and CSS. ## Example ```bash import { Abstract } from "dshapes"; function App() { return (
); } export default App; ```
